title: Two arrested in McCracken County on drug charges
content: MCCRACKEN COUNTY, KY (KFVS) -  Two people were arrested in McCracken County, Ky. on June 2 at 1:42 p.m.    According to McCracken County Sheriff's Department, deputies received a call about a domestic disturbance on Lone Oak road.    Download the KFVS News app:  iPhone  |  Android    When deputies arrived, they hear two people arguing and found a bag of crystal meth, a light and a glass pipe.    Frank Singleton, 25, of Paducah, Ky., was a resident of the apartment as well as Taylor Kendall, 19, of Paducah, Ky.     Both were at the apartment and were taken into custody for Possession of Methamphetamine.     Singleton was also charged with an unrelated warrant out of another county.
